name: Total Metrics Series
queries: max(grafanacloud_instance_billable_usage) by (id) / ignoring(id) group_left() max(grafanacloud_org_metrics_billable_series) by (id) * ignoring(id,org_id,cluster) group_left() avg without(monetary) (grafanacloud_org_metrics_overage) * on (id) group_left(name) topk by(id) (1, grafanacloud_instance_info)- (9999999999 * $is_customer_of_partner) >= 0

max(grafanacloud_instance_billable_usage) by (id) / ignoring(id) group_left() max(grafanacloud_org_metrics_billable_series) by (id) * ignoring(id,org_id,cluster) group_left() avg without(monetary) (grafanacloud_org_metrics_bill_fraction) * on (id) group_left(name) topk by(id) (1, grafanacloud_instance_info)- (2 * $is_customer_of_grafana) >= 0

name: Total Logs Usage

max(grafanacloud_logs_instance_query_overage) by (id) / ignoring(id) group_left() max(grafanacloud_org_logs_usage) by (id) * ignoring(id,org_id,cluster) group_left() avg without(monetary) (grafanacloud_org_logs_overage) * on (id) group_left(name) topk by (id) (1, grafanacloud_logs_instance_info)- (9999999999 * $is_customer_of_partner) >= 0

max(grafanacloud_logs_instance_usage) by (id) / ignoring(id) group_left() max(grafanacloud_org_logs_usage) by (id) * ignoring(id,org_id,cluster) group_left() avg without(monetary) (grafanacloud_org_logs_bill_fraction)* on (id) group_left(name) topk by (id) (1, grafanacloud_logs_instance_info)- (2 * $is_customer_of_grafana) >= 0

max(grafanacloud_profiles_instance_usage) by (id) / ignoring(id) group_left() max(grafanacloud_org_profiles_usage) by (id) * ignoring(id,org_id,cluster) group_left() avg without(monetary) (grafanacloud_org_profiles_bill_fraction)  * on (id) group_left(name) topk by(id)(1, grafanacloud_profiles_instance_info)- (2 * $is_customer_of_grafana) >= 0
